article_title: IP candidate Kevin Terrell imagines how he could break gridlock in Washington

article_metadata.description: On Friday (as MinnPost had divulged just a few hours earlier), Kevin Terrell of Minneapolis announced his candidacy for the Independence Party nomination for the U.S. Senate seat occupied by DFLer Al Franken.

og.description: Terrell wants us to consider what would happen if he and Maine’s independent Sen. Angus King held the balance of power in the Senate next year.
og.title: IP candidate Kevin Terrell imagines how he could break gridlock in Washington
